                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Marshal</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, yonder is your place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Some other is more fit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Knight</div>
                              <div class="line">Contend not, sir; for we are gentlemen</div>
                              <div class="line">That neither in our hearts nor outward eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Envy the great nor do the low despise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">You are right courteous knights.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit, sir, sit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove, I wonder, that is king of thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">These cates resist me, she but thought upon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">By Juno, that is queen of marriage,</div>
                              <div class="line">All viands that I eat do seem unsavoury.</div>
                              <div class="line">Wishing him my meat. Sure, he's a gallant gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">He's but a country gentleman;</div>
                              <div class="line">Has done no more than other knights have done;</div>
                              <div class="line">Has broken a staff or so; so let it pass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">To me he seems like diamond to glass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yon king's to me like to my father's picture,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which tells me in that glory once he was;</div>
                              <div class="line">Had princes sit, like stars, about his throne,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he the sun, for them to reverence;</div>
                              <div class="line">None that beheld him, but, like lesser lights,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did vail their crowns to his supremacy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where now his son's like a glow-worm in the night,</div>
                              <div class="line">The which hath fire in darkness, none in light:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereby I see that Time's the king of men,</div>
                              <div class="line">He's both their parent, and he is their grave,</div>
                              <div class="line">And gives them what he will, not what they crave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you merry, knights?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Knights</div>
                              <div class="line">Who can be other in this royal presence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, with a cup that's stored unto the brim,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As you do love, fill to your mistress' lips,--</div>
                              <div class="line">We drink this health to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KNIGHTS</div>
                              <div class="line">We thank your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet pause awhile:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yon knight doth sit too melancholy,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if the entertainment in our court</div>
                              <div class="line">Had not a show might countervail his worth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Note it not you, Thaisa?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is it</div>
                              <div class="line">To me, my father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, attend, my daughter:</div>
                              <div class="line">Princes in this should live like gods above,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who freely give to every one that comes</div>
                              <div class="line">To honour them:</div>
                              <div class="line">And princes not doing so are like to gnats,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which make a sound, but kill'd are wonder'd at.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore to make his entrance more sweet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, say we drink this standing-bowl of wine to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, my father, it befits not me</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto a stranger knight to be so bold:</div>
                              <div class="line">He may my proffer take for an offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since men take women's gifts for impudence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">How!</div>
                              <div class="line">Do as I bid you, or you'll move me else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Now, by the gods, he could not please me better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">And furthermore tell him, we desire to know of him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of whence he is, his name and parentage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">The king my father, sir, has drunk to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">Wishing it so much blood unto your life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank both him and you, and pledge him freely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">And further he desires to know of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of whence you are, your name and parentage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman of Tyre; my name, Pericles;</div>
                              <div class="line">My education been in arts and arms;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, looking for adventures in the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was by the rough seas reft of ships and men,</div>
                              <div class="line">And after shipwreck driven upon this shore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">He thanks your grace; names himself Pericles,</div>
                              <div class="line">A gentleman of Tyre,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who only by misfortune of the seas</div>
                              <div class="line">Bereft of ships and men, cast on this shore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by the gods, I pity his misfortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will awake him from his melancholy.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, gentlemen, we sit too long on trifles,</div>
                              <div class="line">And waste the time, which looks for other revels.</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in your armours, as you are address'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will very well become a soldier's dance.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not have excuse, with saying this</div>
                              <div class="line">Loud music is too harsh for ladies' heads,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since they love men in arms as well as beds.</div>
                              <p>The Knights dance</p>
                              <div class="line">So, this was well ask'd,'twas so well perform'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is a lady that wants breathing too:</div>
                              <div class="line">And I have heard, you knights of Tyre</div>
                              <div class="line">Are excellent in making ladies trip;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that their measures are as excellent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">In those that practise them they are, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that's as much as you would be denied</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your fair courtesy.</div>
                              <p>The Knights and Ladies dance</p>
                              <div class="line">Unclasp, unclasp:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, gentlemen, to all; all have done well.</div>
                              <p>To PERICLES</p>
                              <div class="line">But you the best. Pages and lights, to conduct</div>
                              <div class="line">These knights unto their several lodgings!</div>
                              <p>To PERICLES</p>
                              <div class="line">Yours, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">We have given order to be next our own.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am at your grace's pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Princes, it is too late to talk of love;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's the mark I know you level at:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore each one betake him to his rest;</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow all for speeding do their best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE IV.  Tyre. A room in the Governor's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HELICANUS and ESCANES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Escanes, know this of me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Antiochus from incest lived not free:</div>
                              <div class="line">For which, the most high gods not minding longer</div>
                              <div class="line">To withhold the vengeance that they had in store,</div>
                              <div class="line">Due to this heinous capital offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the height and pride of all his glory,</div>
                              <div class="line">When he was seated in a chariot</div>
                              <div class="line">Of an inestimable value, and his daughter with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">A fire from heaven came and shrivell'd up</div>
                              <div class="line">Their bodies, even to loathing; for they so stunk,</div>
                              <div class="line">That all those eyes adored them ere their fall</div>
                              <div class="line">Scorn now their hand should give them burial.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCANES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas very strange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet but justice; for though</div>
                              <div class="line">This king were great, his greatness was no guard</div>
                              <div class="line">To bar heaven's shaft, but sin had his reward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCANES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis very true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter two or three Lords</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">See, not a man in private conference</div>
                              <div class="line">Or council has respect with him but he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall no longer grieve without reproof.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">And cursed be he that will not second it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow me, then. Lord Helicane, a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">With me? and welcome: happy day, my lords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Know that our griefs are risen to the top,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now at length they overflow their banks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your griefs! for what? wrong not your prince you love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrong not yourself, then, noble Helicane;</div>
                              <div class="line">But if the prince do live, let us salute him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or know what ground's made happy by his breath.</div>
                              <div class="line">If in the world he live, we'll seek him out;</div>
                              <div class="line">If in his grave he rest, we'll find him there;</div>
                              <div class="line">And be resolved he lives to govern us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or dead, give's cause to mourn his funeral,</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave us to our free election.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose death indeed's the strongest in our censure:</div>
                              <div class="line">And knowing this kingdom is without a head,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Like goodly buildings left without a roof</div>
                              <div class="line">Soon fall to ruin,--your noble self,</div>
                              <div class="line">That best know how to rule and how to reign,</div>
                              <div class="line">We thus submit unto,--our sovereign.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">Live, noble Helicane!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For honour's cause, forbear your suffrages:</div>
                              <div class="line">If that you love Prince Pericles, forbear.</div>
                              <div class="line">Take I your wish, I leap into the seas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's hourly trouble for a minute's ease.</div>
                              <div class="line">A twelvemonth longer, let me entreat you to</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbear the absence of your king:</div>
                              <div class="line">If in which time expired, he not return,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall with aged patience bear your yoke.</div>
                              <div class="line">But if I cannot win you to this love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go search like nobles, like noble subjects,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in your search spend your adventurous worth;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom if you find, and win unto return,</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall like diamonds sit about his crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">To wisdom he's a fool that will not yield;</div>
                              <div class="line">And since Lord Helicane enjoineth us,</div>
                              <div class="line">We with our travels will endeavour us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Then you love us, we you, and we'll clasp hands:</div>
                              <div class="line">When peers thus knit, a kingdom ever stands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE V.  Pentapolis. A room in the palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIMONIDES, reading a letter, at one door:
the Knights meet him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Knight</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow to the good Simonides.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Knights, from my daughter this I let you know,</div>
                              <div class="line">That for this twelvemonth she'll not undertake</div>
                              <div class="line">A married life.</div>
                              <div class="line">Her reason to herself is only known,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which yet from her by no means can I get.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Knight</div>
                              <div class="line">May we not get access to her, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, by no means; she has so strictly tied</div>
                              <div class="line">Her to her chamber, that 'tis impossible.</div>
                              <div class="line">One twelve moons more she'll wear Diana's livery;</div>
                              <div class="line">This by the eye of Cynthia hath she vow'd</div>
                              <div class="line">And on her virgin honour will not break it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Knight</div>
                              <div class="line">Loath to bid farewell, we take our leaves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Knights</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">So,</div>
                              <div class="line">They are well dispatch'd; now to my daughter's letter:</div>
                              <div class="line">She tells me here, she'd wed the stranger knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or never more to view nor day nor light.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well, mistress; your choice agrees with mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">I like that well: nay, how absolute she's in't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not minding whether I dislike or no!</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I do commend her choice;</div>
                              <div class="line">And will no longer have it be delay'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft! here he comes: I must dissemble it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PERICLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">All fortune to the good Simonides!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">To you as much, sir! I am beholding to you</div>
                              <div class="line">For your sweet music this last night: I do</div>
                              <div class="line">Protest my ears were never better fed</div>
                              <div class="line">With such delightful pleasing harmony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">It is your grace's pleasure to commend;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not my desert.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you are music's master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">The worst of all her scholars, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me ask you one thing:</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you think of my daughter, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A most virtuous princess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">And she is fair too, is she not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">As a fair day in summer, wondrous fair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, my daughter thinks very well of you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, so well, that you must be her master,</div>
                              <div class="line">And she will be your scholar: therefore look to it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am unworthy for her schoolmaster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">She thinks not so; peruse this writing else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  What's here?</div>
                              <div class="line">A letter, that she loves the knight of Tyre!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis the king's subtlety to have my life.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, seek not to entrap me, gracious lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">A stranger and distressed gentleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">That never aim'd so high to love your daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">But bent all offices to honour her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast bewitch'd my daughter, and thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">A villain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">By the gods, I have not:</div>
                              <div class="line">Never did thought of mine levy offence;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor never did my actions yet commence</div>
                              <div class="line">A deed might gain her love or your displeasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Traitor, thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Traitor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, traitor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in his throat--unless it be the king--</div>
                              <div class="line">That calls me traitor, I return the lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Now, by the gods, I do applaud his courage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My actions are as noble as my thoughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">That never relish'd of a base descent.</div>
                              <div class="line">I came unto your court for honour's cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not to be a rebel to her state;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he that otherwise accounts of me,</div>
                              <div class="line">This sword shall prove he's honour's enemy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">No?</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes my daughter, she can witness it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter THAISA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, as you are as virtuous as fair,</div>
                              <div class="line">Resolve your angry father, if my tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Did ere solicit, or my hand subscribe</div>
                              <div class="line">To any syllable that made love to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, say if you had,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who takes offence at that would make me glad?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, mistress, are you so peremptory?</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">I am glad on't with all my heart.--</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tame you; I'll bring you in subjection.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you, not having my consent,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bestow your love and your affections</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon a stranger?</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">who, for aught I know,</div>
                              <div class="line">May be, nor can I think the contrary,</div>
                              <div class="line">As great in blood as I myself.--</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore hear you, mistress; either frame</div>
                              <div class="line">Your will to mine,--and you, sir, hear you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either be ruled by me, or I will make you--</div>
                              <div class="line">Man and wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come, your hands and lips must seal it too:</div>
                              <div class="line">And being join'd, I'll thus your hopes destroy;</div>
                              <div class="line">And for a further grief,--God give you joy!--</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you both pleased?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">THAISA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, if you love me, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as my life, or blood that fosters it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you both agreed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, if it please your majesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMONIDES</div>
                              <div class="line">It pleaseth me so well, that I will see you wed;</div>
                              <div class="line">And then with what haste you can get you to bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. [Prologue]</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE I</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE II.  Ephesus. A room in CERIMON's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE III.  Tarsus. A room in CLEON's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE IV.  Ephesus. A room in CERIMON's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. [Prologue]</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GOWER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now sleep y-slaked hath the rout;</div>
                              <div class="line">No din but snores the house about,</div>
                              <div class="line">Made louder by the o'er-fed breast</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this most pompous marriage-feast.</div>
                              <div class="line">The cat, with eyne of burning coal,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now crouches fore the mouse's hole;</div>
                              <div class="line">And crickets sing at the oven's mouth,</div>
                              <div class="line">E'er the blither for their drouth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hymen hath brought the bride to bed.</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, by the loss of maidenhead,</div>
                              <div class="line">A babe is moulded. Be attent,</div>
                              <div class="line">And time that is so briefly spent</div>
                              <div class="line">With your fine fancies quaintly eche:</div>
                              <div class="line">What's dumb in show I'll plain with speech.</div>
                              <h3 class="bridgehead">DUMB SHOW.</h3>
                              <p>Enter, PERICLES and SIMONIDES at one door, with
Attendants; a Messenger meets them, kneels, and
gives PERICLES a letter: PERICLES shows it
SIMONIDES; the Lords kneel to him. Then enter
THAISA with child, with LYCHORIDA a nurse. The
KING shows her the letter; she rejoices: she and
PERICLES takes leave of her father, and depart with
LYCHORIDA and their Attendants. Then exeunt
SIMONIDES and the rest</p>
                              <div class="line">By many a dern and painful perch</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Pericles the careful search,</div>
                              <div class="line">By the four opposing coigns</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the world together joins,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is made with all due diligence</div>
                              <div class="line">That horse and sail and high expense</div>
                              <div class="line">Can stead the quest. At last from Tyre,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fame answering the most strange inquire,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the court of King Simonides</div>
                              <div class="line">Are letters brought, the tenor these:</div>
                              <div class="line">Antiochus and his daughter dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">The men of Tyrus on the head</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Helicanus would set on</div>
                              <div class="line">The crown of Tyre, but he will none:</div>
                              <div class="line">The mutiny he there hastes t' oppress;</div>
                              <div class="line">Says to 'em, if King Pericles</div>
                              <div class="line">Come not home in twice six moons,</div>
                              <div class="line">He, obedient to their dooms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will take the crown. The sum of this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Brought hither to Pentapolis,</div>
                              <div class="line">Y-ravished the regions round,</div>
                              <div class="line">And every one with claps can sound,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Our heir-apparent is a king!</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dream'd, who thought of such a thing?'</div>
                              <div class="line">Brief, he must hence depart to Tyre:</div>
                              <div class="line">His queen with child makes her desire--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which who shall cross?--along to go:</div>
                              <div class="line">Omit we all their dole and woe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lychorida, her nurse, she takes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so to sea. Their vessel shakes</div>
                              <div class="line">On Neptune's billow; half the flood</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath their keel cut: but fortune's mood</div>
                              <div class="line">Varies again; the grisly north</div>
                              <div class="line">Disgorges such a tempest forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, as a duck for life that dives,</div>
                              <div class="line">So up and down the poor ship drives:</div>
                              <div class="line">The lady shrieks, and well-a-near</div>
                              <div class="line">Does fall in travail with her fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">And what ensues in this fell storm</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall for itself itself perform.</div>
                              <div class="line">I nill relate, action may</div>
                              <div class="line">Conveniently the rest convey;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which might not what by me is told.</div>
                              <div class="line">In your imagination hold</div>
                              <div class="line">This stage the ship, upon whose deck</div>
                              <div class="line">The sea-tost Pericles appears to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE I</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PERICLES, on shipboard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou god of this great vast, rebuke these surges,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which wash both heaven and hell; and thou, that hast</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the winds command, bind them in brass,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having call'd them from the deep! O, still</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy deafening, dreadful thunders; gently quench</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy nimble, sulphurous flashes! O, how, Lychorida,</div>
                              <div class="line">How does my queen? Thou stormest venomously;</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou spit all thyself? The seaman's whistle</div>
                              <div class="line">Is as a whisper in the ears of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unheard. Lychorida!--Lucina, O</div>
                              <div class="line">Divinest patroness, and midwife gentle</div>
                              <div class="line">To those that cry by night, convey thy deity</div>
                              <div class="line">Aboard our dancing boat; make swift the pangs</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my queen's travails!</div>
                              <p>Enter LYCHORIDA, with an Infant</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, Lychorida!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYCHORIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is a thing too young for such a place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, if it had conceit, would die, as I</div>
                              <div class="line">Am like to do: take in your arms this piece</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your dead queen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">How, how, Lychorida!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYCHORIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, good sir; do not assist the storm.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's all that is left living of your queen,</div>
                              <div class="line">A little daughter: for the sake of it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be manly, and take comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">O you gods!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you make us love your goodly gifts,</div>
                              <div class="line">And snatch them straight away? We here below</div>
                              <div class="line">Recall not what we give, and therein may</div>
                              <div class="line">Use honour with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYCHORIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, good sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even for this charge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, mild may be thy life!</div>
                              <div class="line">For a more blustrous birth had never babe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Quiet and gentle thy conditions! for</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the rudeliest welcome to this world</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever was prince's child. Happy what follows!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast as chiding a nativity</div>
                              <div class="line">As fire, air, water, earth, and heaven can make,</div>
                              <div class="line">To herald thee from the womb: even at the first</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy loss is more than can thy portage quit,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all thou canst find here. Now, the good gods</div>
                              <div class="line">Throw their best eyes upon't!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter two Sailors</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">What courage, sir? God save you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Courage enough: I do not fear the flaw;</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath done to me the worst. Yet, for the love</div>
                              <div class="line">Of this poor infant, this fresh-new sea-farer,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would it would be quiet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Slack the bolins there! Thou wilt not, wilt thou?</div>
                              <div class="line">Blow, and split thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">But sea-room, an the brine and cloudy billow kiss</div>
                              <div class="line">the moon, I care not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, your queen must overboard: the sea works high,</div>
                              <div class="line">the wind is loud, and will not lie till the ship be</div>
                              <div class="line">cleared of the dead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">That's your superstition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon us, sir; with us at sea it hath been still</div>
                              <div class="line">observed: and we are strong in custom. Therefore</div>
                              <div class="line">briefly yield her; for she must overboard straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">As you think meet. Most wretched queen!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYCHORIDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Here she lies, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A terrible childbed hast thou had, my dear;</div>
                              <div class="line">No light, no fire: the unfriendly elements</div>
                              <div class="line">Forgot thee utterly: nor have I time</div>
                              <div class="line">To give thee hallow'd to thy grave, but straight</div>
                              <div class="line">Must cast thee, scarcely coffin'd, in the ooze;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, for a monument upon thy bones,</div>
                              <div class="line">And e'er-remaining lamps, the belching whale</div>
                              <div class="line">And humming water must o'erwhelm thy corpse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lying with simple shells. O Lychorida,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid Nestor bring me spices, ink and paper,</div>
                              <div class="line">My casket and my jewels; and bid Nicander</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring me the satin coffer: lay the babe</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the pillow: hie thee, whiles I say</div>
                              <div class="line">A priestly farewell to her: suddenly, woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit LYCHORIDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, we have a chest beneath the hatches, caulked</div>
                              <div class="line">and bitumed ready.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee. Mariner, say what coast is this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">We are near Tarsus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Thither, gentle mariner.</div>
                              <div class="line">Alter thy course for Tyre. When canst thou reach it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">By break of day, if the wind cease.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, make for Tarsus!</div>
                              <div class="line">There will I visit Cleon, for the babe</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot hold out to Tyrus: there I'll leave it</div>
                              <div class="line">At careful nursing. Go thy ways, good mariner:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring the body presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE II.  Ephesus. A room in CERIMON's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CERIMON, with a Servant, and some Persons who
have been shipwrecked</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Philemon, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PHILEMON</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PHILEMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth my lord call?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Get fire and meat for these poor men:</div>
                              <div class="line">'T has been a turbulent and stormy night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been in many; but such a night as this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till now, I ne'er endured.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Your master will be dead ere you return;</div>
                              <div class="line">There's nothing can be minister'd to nature</div>
                              <div class="line">That can recover him.</div>
                              <p>To PHILEMON</p>
                              <div class="line">Give this to the 'pothecary,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell me how it works.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but CERIMON</p>
                        <p>Enter two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow to your lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you stir so early?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our lodgings, standing bleak upon the sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shook as the earth did quake;</div>
                              <div class="line">The very principals did seem to rend,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all-to topple: pure surprise and fear</div>
                              <div class="line">Made me to quit the house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">That is the cause we trouble you so early;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not our husbandry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">O, you say well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">But I much marvel that your lordship, having</div>
                              <div class="line">Rich tire about you, should at these early hours</div>
                              <div class="line">Shake off the golden slumber of repose.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis most strange,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature should be so conversant with pain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being thereto not compell'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold it ever,</div>
                              <div class="line">Virtue and cunning were endowments greater</div>
                              <div class="line">Than nobleness and riches: careless heirs</div>
                              <div class="line">May the two latter darken and expend;</div>
                              <div class="line">But immortality attends the former.</div>
                              <div class="line">Making a man a god. 'Tis known, I ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Have studied physic, through which secret art,</div>
                              <div class="line">By turning o'er authorities, I have,</div>
                              <div class="line">Together with my practise, made familiar</div>
                              <div class="line">To me and to my aid the blest infusions</div>
                              <div class="line">That dwell in vegetives, in metals, stones;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I can speak of the disturbances</div>
                              <div class="line">That nature works, and of her cures; which doth give me</div>
                              <div class="line">A more content in course of true delight</div>
                              <div class="line">Than to be thirsty after tottering honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or tie my treasure up in silken bags,</div>
                              <div class="line">To please the fool and death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Your honour has through Ephesus pour'd forth</div>
                              <div class="line">Your charity, and hundreds call themselves</div>
                              <div class="line">Your creatures, who by you have been restored:</div>
                              <div class="line">And not your knowledge, your personal pain, but even</div>
                              <div class="line">Your purse, still open, hath built Lord Cerimon</div>
                              <div class="line">Such strong renown as time shall ne'er decay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter two or three Servants with a chest</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">So; lift there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">What is that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, even now</div>
                              <div class="line">Did the sea toss upon our shore this chest:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis of some wreck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Set 't down, let's look upon't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis like a coffin, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Whate'er it be,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis wondrous heavy. Wrench it open straight:</div>
                              <div class="line">If the sea's stomach be o'ercharged with gold,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a good constraint of fortune it belches upon us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">How close 'tis caulk'd and bitumed!</div>
                              <div class="line">Did the sea cast it up?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I never saw so huge a billow, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">As toss'd it upon shore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrench it open;</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft! it smells most sweetly in my sense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">A delicate odour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERIMON</div>
