                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIONYZA</div>
                              <div class="line">You are like one that superstitiously</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth swear to the gods that winter kills the flies:</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet I know you'll do as I advise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE IV</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GOWER, before the monument of MARINA at Tarsus</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus time we waste, and longest leagues make short;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sail seas in cockles, have an wish but for't;</div>
                              <div class="line">Making, to take your imagination,</div>
                              <div class="line">From bourn to bourn, region to region.</div>
                              <div class="line">By you being pardon'd, we commit no crime</div>
                              <div class="line">To use one language in each several clime</div>
                              <div class="line">Where our scenes seem to live. I do beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">To learn of me, who stand i' the gaps to teach you,</div>
                              <div class="line">The stages of our story. Pericles</div>
                              <div class="line">Is now again thwarting the wayward seas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Attended on by many a lord and knight.</div>
                              <div class="line">To see his daughter, all his life's delight.</div>
                              <div class="line">Old Escanes, whom Helicanus late</div>
                              <div class="line">Advanced in time to great and high estate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is left to govern. Bear you it in mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Old Helicanus goes along behind.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well-sailing ships and bounteous winds have brought</div>
                              <div class="line">This king to Tarsus,--think his pilot thought;</div>
                              <div class="line">So with his steerage shall your thoughts grow on,--</div>
                              <div class="line">To fetch his daughter home, who first is gone.</div>
                              <div class="line">Like motes and shadows see them move awhile;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your ears unto your eyes I'll reconcile.</div>
                              <h3 class="bridgehead">DUMB SHOW.</h3>
                              <p>Enter PERICLES, at one door, with all his train;
CLEON and DIONYZA, at the other. CLEON shows
PERICLES the tomb; whereat PERICLES makes
lamentation, puts on sackcloth, and in a mighty
passion departs. Then exeunt CLEON and DIONYZA</p>
                              <div class="line">See how belief may suffer by foul show!</div>
                              <div class="line">This borrow'd passion stands for true old woe;</div>
                              <div class="line">And Pericles, in sorrow all devour'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">With sighs shot through, and biggest tears</div>
                              <div class="line">o'ershower'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Leaves Tarsus and again embarks. He swears</div>
                              <div class="line">Never to wash his face, nor cut his hairs:</div>
                              <div class="line">He puts on sackcloth, and to sea. He bears</div>
                              <div class="line">A tempest, which his mortal vessel tears,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet he rides it out. Now please you wit.</div>
                              <div class="line">The epitaph is for Marina writ</div>
                              <div class="line">By wicked Dionyza.</div>
                              <p>Reads the inscription on MARINA's monument</p>
                              <div class="line">'The fairest, sweet'st, and best lies here,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who wither'd in her spring of year.</div>
                              <div class="line">She was of Tyrus the king's daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">On whom foul death hath made this slaughter;</div>
                              <div class="line">Marina was she call'd; and at her birth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thetis, being proud, swallow'd some part o' the earth:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore the earth, fearing to be o'erflow'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath Thetis' birth-child on the heavens bestow'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore she does, and swears she'll never stint,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make raging battery upon shores of flint.'</div>
                              <div class="line">No visor does become black villany</div>
                              <div class="line">So well as soft and tender flattery.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let Pericles believe his daughter's dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bear his courses to be ordered</div>
                              <div class="line">By Lady Fortune; while our scene must play</div>
                              <div class="line">His daughter's woe and heavy well-a-day</div>
                              <div class="line">In her unholy service. Patience, then,</div>
                              <div class="line">And think you now are all in Mytilene.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE V.  Mytilene. A street before the brothel.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter, from the brothel, two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you ever hear the like?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">No, nor never shall do in such a place as this, she</div>
                              <div class="line">being once gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">But to have divinity preached there! did you ever</div>
                              <div class="line">dream of such a thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no. Come, I am for no more bawdy-houses:</div>
                              <div class="line">shall's go hear the vestals sing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll do any thing now that is virtuous; but I</div>
                              <div class="line">am out of the road of rutting for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.8">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>7. SCENE VI.  The same. A room in the brothel.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Pandar, Bawd, and BOULT</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pandar</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I had rather than twice the worth of her she</div>
                              <div class="line">had ne'er come here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie upon her! she's able to freeze the god</div>
                              <div class="line">Priapus, and undo a whole generation. We must</div>
                              <div class="line">either get her ravished, or be rid of her. When she</div>
                              <div class="line">should do for clients her fitment, and do me the</div>
                              <div class="line">kindness of our profession, she has me her quirks,</div>
                              <div class="line">her reasons, her master reasons, her prayers, her</div>
                              <div class="line">knees; that she would make a puritan of the devil,</div>
                              <div class="line">if he should cheapen a kiss of her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, I must ravish her, or she'll disfurnish us</div>
                              <div class="line">of all our cavaliers, and make our swearers priests.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pandar</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, the pox upon her green-sickness for me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, there's no way to be rid on't but by the</div>
                              <div class="line">way to the pox. Here comes the Lord Lysimachus disguised.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">We should have both lord and lown, if the peevish</div>
                              <div class="line">baggage would but give way to customers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LYSIMACHUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! How a dozen of virginities?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, the gods to-bless your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see your honour in good health.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You may so; 'tis the better for you that your</div>
                              <div class="line">resorters stand upon sound legs. How now!</div>
                              <div class="line">wholesome iniquity have you that a man may deal</div>
                              <div class="line">withal, and defy the surgeon?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">We have here one, sir, if she would--but there never</div>
                              <div class="line">came her like in Mytilene.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If she'ld do the deed of darkness, thou wouldst say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Your honour knows what 'tis to say well enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, call forth, call forth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">For flesh and blood, sir, white and red, you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">see a rose; and she were a rose indeed, if she had but--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What, prithee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, I can be modest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That dignifies the renown of a bawd, no less than it</div>
                              <div class="line">gives a good report to a number to be chaste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit BOULT</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes that which grows to the stalk; never</div>
                              <div class="line">plucked yet, I can assure you.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter BOULT with MARINA</p>
                              <div class="line">Is she not a fair creature?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, she would serve after a long voyage at sea.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, there's for you: leave us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your honour, give me leave: a word, and</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have done presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you, do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To MARINA</span>  First, I would have you note, this is</div>
                              <div class="line">an honourable man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I desire to find him so, that I may worthily note him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Next, he's the governor of this country, and a man</div>
                              <div class="line">whom I am bound to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">If he govern the country, you are bound to him</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed; but how honourable he is in that, I know not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, without any more virginal fencing, will</div>
                              <div class="line">you use him kindly? He will line your apron with gold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">What he will do graciously, I will thankfully receive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha' you done?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, she's not paced yet: you must take some</div>
                              <div class="line">pains to work her to your manage. Come, we will</div>
                              <div class="line">leave his honour and her together. Go thy ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Bawd, Pandar, and BOULT</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, pretty one, how long have you been at this trade?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">What trade, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I cannot name't but I shall offend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot be offended with my trade. Please you to name it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How long have you been of this profession?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">E'er since I can remember.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you go to 't so young? Were you a gamester at</div>
                              <div class="line">five or at seven?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Earlier too, sir, if now I be one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, the house you dwell in proclaims you to be a</div>
                              <div class="line">creature of sale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know this house to be a place of such resort,</div>
                              <div class="line">and will come into 't? I hear say you are of</div>
                              <div class="line">honourable parts, and are the governor of this place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, hath your principal made known unto you who I am?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is my principal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, your herb-woman; she that sets seeds and roots</div>
                              <div class="line">of shame and iniquity. O, you have heard something</div>
                              <div class="line">of my power, and so stand aloof for more serious</div>
                              <div class="line">wooing. But I protest to thee, pretty one, my</div>
                              <div class="line">authority shall not see thee, or else look friendly</div>
                              <div class="line">upon thee. Come, bring me to some private place:</div>
                              <div class="line">come, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">If you were born to honour, show it now;</div>
                              <div class="line">If put upon you, make the judgment good</div>
                              <div class="line">That thought you worthy of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How's this? how's this? Some more; be sage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">For me,</div>
                              <div class="line">That am a maid, though most ungentle fortune</div>
                              <div class="line">Have placed me in this sty, where, since I came,</div>
                              <div class="line">Diseases have been sold dearer than physic,</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that the gods</div>
                              <div class="line">Would set me free from this unhallow'd place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though they did change me to the meanest bird</div>
                              <div class="line">That flies i' the purer air!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not think</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou couldst have spoke so well; ne'er dream'd thou couldst.</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I brought hither a corrupted mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy speech had alter'd it. Hold, here's gold for thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Persever in that clear way thou goest,</div>
                              <div class="line">And the gods strengthen thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">The good gods preserve you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For me, be you thoughten</div>
                              <div class="line">That I came with no ill intent; for to me</div>
                              <div class="line">The very doors and windows savour vilely.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare thee well. Thou art a piece of virtue, and</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt not but thy training hath been noble.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, here's more gold for thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">A curse upon him, die he like a thief,</div>
                              <div class="line">That robs thee of thy goodness! If thou dost</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear from me, it shall be for thy good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BOULT</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your honour, one piece for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Avaunt, thou damned door-keeper!</div>
                              <div class="line">Your house, but for this virgin that doth prop it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would sink and overwhelm you. Away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">How's this? We must take another course with you.</div>
                              <div class="line">If your peevish chastity, which is not worth a</div>
                              <div class="line">breakfast in the cheapest country under the cope,</div>
                              <div class="line">shall undo a whole household, let me be gelded like</div>
                              <div class="line">a spaniel. Come your ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither would you have me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">I must have your maidenhead taken off, or the common</div>
                              <div class="line">hangman shall execute it. Come your ways. We'll</div>
                              <div class="line">have no more gentlemen driven away. Come your ways, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Bawd</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">Worse and worse, mistress; she has here spoken holy</div>
                              <div class="line">words to the Lord Lysimachus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">O abominable!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">She makes our profession as it were to stink afore</div>
                              <div class="line">the face of the gods.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, hang her up for ever!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">The nobleman would have dealt with her like a</div>
                              <div class="line">nobleman, and she sent him away as cold as a</div>
                              <div class="line">snowball; saying his prayers too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">Boult, take her away; use her at thy pleasure:</div>
                              <div class="line">crack the glass of her virginity, and make the rest malleable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">An if she were a thornier piece of ground than she</div>
                              <div class="line">is, she shall be ploughed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, hark, you gods!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">She conjures: away with her! Would she had never</div>
                              <div class="line">come within my doors! Marry, hang you! She's born</div>
                              <div class="line">to undo us. Will you not go the way of women-kind?</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, come up, my dish of chastity with rosemary and bays!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, mistress; come your ways with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither wilt thou have me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">To take from you the jewel you hold so dear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, tell me one thing first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">Come now, your one thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">What canst thou wish thine enemy to be?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I could wish him to be my master, or rather, my mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither of these are so bad as thou art,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since they do better thee in their command.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hold'st a place, for which the pained'st fiend</div>
                              <div class="line">Of hell would not in reputation change:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the damned doorkeeper to every</div>
                              <div class="line">Coistrel that comes inquiring for his Tib;</div>
                              <div class="line">To the choleric fisting of every rogue</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy ear is liable; thy food is such</div>
                              <div class="line">As hath been belch'd on by infected lungs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you have me do? go to the wars, would</div>
                              <div class="line">you? where a man may serve seven years for the loss</div>
                              <div class="line">of a leg, and have not money enough in the end to</div>
                              <div class="line">buy him a wooden one?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do any thing but this thou doest. Empty</div>
                              <div class="line">Old receptacles, or common shores, of filth;</div>
                              <div class="line">Serve by indenture to the common hangman:</div>
                              <div class="line">Any of these ways are yet better than this;</div>
                              <div class="line">For what thou professest, a baboon, could he speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would own a name too dear. O, that the gods</div>
                              <div class="line">Would safely deliver me from this place!</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, here's gold for thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">If that thy master would gain by thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaim that I can sing, weave, sew, and dance,</div>
                              <div class="line">With other virtues, which I'll keep from boast:</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will undertake all these to teach.</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt not but this populous city will</div>
                              <div class="line">Yield many scholars.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">But can you teach all this you speak of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove that I cannot, take me home again,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prostitute me to the basest groom</div>
                              <div class="line">That doth frequent your house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will see what I can do for thee: if I can</div>
                              <div class="line">place thee, I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">But amongst honest women.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BOULT</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, my acquaintance lies little amongst them.</div>
                              <div class="line">But since my master and mistress have bought you,</div>
                              <div class="line">there's no going but by their consent: therefore I</div>
                              <div class="line">will make them acquainted with your purpose, and I</div>
                              <div class="line">doubt not but I shall find them tractable enough.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I'll do for thee what I can; come your ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. [Prologue]</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE I.  On board PERICLES' ship, off Mytilene. A close pavilion on deck, with a curtain before it; PERICLES within it, reclined on a couch. A barge lying beside the Tyrian vessel.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE II</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE III.  The temple of Diana at Ephesus; THAISA standing near the altar, as high priestess; a number of Virgins on each side; CERIMON and other Inhabitants of Ephesus attending.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. [Prologue]</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GOWER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GOWER</div>
                              <div class="line">Marina thus the brothel 'scapes, and chances</div>
                              <div class="line">Into an honest house, our story says.</div>
                              <div class="line">She sings like one immortal, and she dances</div>
                              <div class="line">As goddess-like to her admired lays;</div>
                              <div class="line">Deep clerks she dumbs; and with her needle composes</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's own shape, of bud, bird, branch, or berry,</div>
                              <div class="line">That even her art sisters the natural roses;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her inkle, silk, twin with the rubied cherry:</div>
                              <div class="line">That pupils lacks she none of noble race,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who pour their bounty on her; and her gain</div>
                              <div class="line">She gives the cursed bawd. Here we her place;</div>
                              <div class="line">And to her father turn our thoughts again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where we left him, on the sea. We there him lost;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whence, driven before the winds, he is arrived</div>
                              <div class="line">Here where his daughter dwells; and on this coast</div>
                              <div class="line">Suppose him now at anchor. The city strived</div>
                              <div class="line">God Neptune's annual feast to keep: from whence</div>
                              <div class="line">Lysimachus our Tyrian ship espies,</div>
                              <div class="line">His banners sable, trimm'd with rich expense;</div>
                              <div class="line">And to him in his barge with fervor hies.</div>
                              <div class="line">In your supposing once more put your sight</div>
                              <div class="line">Of heavy Pericles; think this his bark:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where what is done in action, more, if might,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be discover'd; please you, sit and hark.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE I.  On board PERICLES' ship, off Mytilene. A close pavilion on deck, with a curtain before it; PERICLES within it, reclined on a couch. A barge lying beside the Tyrian vessel.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter two Sailors, one belonging to the Tyrian
vessel, the other to the barge; to them HELICANUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tyrian Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To the Sailor of Mytilene</span>  Where is lord Helicanus?</div>
                              <div class="line">he can resolve you.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, here he is.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, there's a barge put off from Mytilene,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in it is Lysimachus the governor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who craves to come aboard. What is your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That he have his. Call up some gentlemen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tyrian Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Ho, gentlemen! my lord calls.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter two or three Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth your lordship call?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen, there's some of worth would come aboard;</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray ye, greet them fairly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The Gentlemen and the two Sailors descend, and go
on board the barge</p>
                        <p>Enter, from thence, LYSIMACHUS and Lords; with the
Gentlemen and the two Sailors</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tyrian Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the man that can, in aught you would,</div>
                              <div class="line">Resolve you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, reverend sir! the gods preserve you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, sir, to outlive the age I am,</div>
                              <div class="line">And die as I would do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You wish me well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Being on shore, honouring of Neptune's triumphs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seeing this goodly vessel ride before us,</div>
                              <div class="line">I made to it, to know of whence you are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">First, what is your place?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the governor of this place you lie before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our vessel is of Tyre, in it the king;</div>
                              <div class="line">A man who for this three months hath not spoken</div>
                              <div class="line">To any one, nor taken sustenance</div>
                              <div class="line">But to prorogue his grief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon what ground is his distemperature?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twould be too tedious to repeat;</div>
                              <div class="line">But the main grief springs from the loss</div>
                              <div class="line">Of a beloved daughter and a wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">May we not see him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You may;</div>
                              <div class="line">But bootless is your sight: he will not speak To any.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet let me obtain my wish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold him.</div>
                              <p>PERICLES discovered</p>
                              <div class="line">This was a goodly person,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till the disaster that, one mortal night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Drove him to this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir king, all hail! the gods preserve you!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, royal sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is in vain; he will not speak to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">We have a maid in Mytilene, I durst wager,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would win some words of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well bethought.</div>
                              <div class="line">She questionless with her sweet harmony</div>
                              <div class="line">And other chosen attractions, would allure,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make a battery through his deafen'd parts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now are midway stopp'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">She is all happy as the fairest of all,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, with her fellow maids is now upon</div>
                              <div class="line">The leafy shelter that abuts against</div>
                              <div class="line">The island's side.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Whispers a Lord, who goes off in the barge of
LYSIMACHUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, all's effectless; yet nothing we'll omit</div>
                              <div class="line">That bears recovery's name. But, since your kindness</div>
                              <div class="line">We have stretch'd thus far, let us beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">That for our gold we may provision have,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein we are not destitute for want,</div>
                              <div class="line">But weary for the staleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, a courtesy</div>
                              <div class="line">Which if we should deny, the most just gods</div>
                              <div class="line">For every graff would send a caterpillar,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so afflict our province. Yet once more</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me entreat to know at large the cause</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your king's sorrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit, sir, I will recount it to you:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, see, I am prevented.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter, from the barge, Lord, with MARINA, and a
young Lady</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, here is</div>
                              <div class="line">The lady that I sent for. Welcome, fair one!</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't not a goodly presence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELICANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">She's a gallant lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">She's such a one, that, were I well assured</div>
                              <div class="line">Came of a gentle kind and noble stock,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'ld wish no better choice, and think me rarely wed.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair one, all goodness that consists in bounty</div>
                              <div class="line">Expect even here, where is a kingly patient:</div>
                              <div class="line">If that thy prosperous and artificial feat</div>
                              <div class="line">Can draw him but to answer thee in aught,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy sacred physic shall receive such pay</div>
                              <div class="line">As thy desires can wish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I will use</div>
                              <div class="line">My utmost skill in his recovery, Provided</div>
                              <div class="line">That none but I and my companion maid</div>
                              <div class="line">Be suffer'd to come near him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let us leave her;</div>
                              <div class="line">And the gods make her prosperous!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>MARINA sings</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark'd he your music?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, nor look'd on us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LYSIMACHUS</div>
                              <div class="line">See, she will speak to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, sir! my lord, lend ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hum, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, that ne'er before invited eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">But have been gazed on like a comet: she speaks,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, that, may be, hath endured a grief</div>
                              <div class="line">Might equal yours, if both were justly weigh'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Though wayward fortune did malign my state,</div>
                              <div class="line">My derivation was from ancestors</div>
                              <div class="line">Who stood equivalent with mighty kings:</div>
                              <div class="line">But time hath rooted out my parentage,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to the world and awkward casualties</div>
                              <div class="line">Bound me in servitude.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">I will desist;</div>
                              <div class="line">But there is something glows upon my cheek,</div>
                              <div class="line">And whispers in mine ear, 'Go not till he speak.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My fortunes--parentage--good parentage--</div>
                              <div class="line">To equal mine!--was it not thus? what say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I said, my lord, if you did know my parentage,</div>
                              <div class="line">You would not do me violence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I do think so. Pray you, turn your eyes upon me.</div>
                              <div class="line">You are like something that--What country-woman?</div>
                              <div class="line">Here of these shores?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, nor of any shores:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet I was mortally brought forth, and am</div>
                              <div class="line">No other than I appear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am great with woe, and shall deliver weeping.</div>
                              <div class="line">My dearest wife was like this maid, and such a one</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter might have been: my queen's square brows;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her stature to an inch; as wand-like straight;</div>
                              <div class="line">As silver-voiced; her eyes as jewel-like</div>
                              <div class="line">And cased as richly; in pace another Juno;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who starves the ears she feeds, and makes them hungry,</div>
                              <div class="line">The more she gives them speech. Where do you live?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Where I am but a stranger: from the deck</div>
                              <div class="line">You may discern the place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Where were you bred?</div>
                              <div class="line">And how achieved you these endowments, which</div>
                              <div class="line">You make more rich to owe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I should tell my history, it would seem</div>
                              <div class="line">Like lies disdain'd in the reporting.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">Falseness cannot come from thee; for thou look'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Modest as Justice, and thou seem'st a palace</div>
                              <div class="line">For the crown'd Truth to dwell in: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">believe thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make my senses credit thy relation</div>
                              <div class="line">To points that seem impossible; for thou look'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Like one I loved indeed. What were thy friends?</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou not say, when I did push thee back--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was when I perceived thee--that thou camest</div>
                              <div class="line">From good descending?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">So indeed I did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Report thy parentage. I think thou said'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hadst been toss'd from wrong to injury,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that thou thought'st thy griefs might equal mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">If both were open'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Some such thing</div>
                              <div class="line">I said, and said no more but what my thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">Did warrant me was likely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell thy story;</div>
                              <div class="line">If thine consider'd prove the thousandth part</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my endurance, thou art a man, and I</div>
                              <div class="line">Have suffer'd like a girl: yet thou dost look</div>
                              <div class="line">Like Patience gazing on kings' graves, and smiling</div>
                              <div class="line">Extremity out of act. What were thy friends?</div>
                              <div class="line">How lost thou them? Thy name, my most kind virgin?</div>
                              <div class="line">Recount, I do beseech thee: come, sit by me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">My name is Marina.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I am mock'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou by some incensed god sent hither</div>
                              <div class="line">To make the world to laugh at me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, good sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or here I'll cease.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I'll be patient.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou little know'st how thou dost startle me,</div>
                              <div class="line">To call thyself Marina.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">The name</div>
                              <div class="line">Was given me by one that had some power,</div>
                              <div class="line">My father, and a king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PERICLES</div>
                              <div class="line">How! a king's daughter?</div>
                              <div class="line">And call'd Marina?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">You said you would believe me;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, not to be a troubler of your peace,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will end here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
